price: Dájúdájú ebi kò níí pa ọ́, o ò sì níí rìn hòhò nínú rẹ̀.
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعۡرَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna laka allā tajūʿa fīhā walā taʿrā
